LanguageData.SleepingSpot.label: sleeping spot
LanguageData.SleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.SleepingSpot_Blueprint.label: sleeping spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.SleepingSpot_Frame.label: sleeping spot (building)
LanguageData.SleepingSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot.label: double sleeping spot
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where two people should sleep together. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot_Blueprint.label: double sleeping spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot_Frame.label: double sleeping spot (building)
LanguageData.DoubleSleepingSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot on the ground where two people should sleep together. Not comfortable.
LanguageData.Bed.label: bed
LanguageData.Bed.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
LanguageData.Bed_Blueprint.label: bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bed_Blueprint_Install.label: bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bed_Frame.label: bed (building)
LanguageData.Bed_Frame.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.
LanguageData.DoubleBed.label: double bed
LanguageData.DoubleBed.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.
LanguageData.DoubleBed_Blueprint.label: double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.DoubleBed_Blueprint_Install.label: double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.DoubleBed_Frame.label: double bed (building)
LanguageData.DoubleBed_Frame.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.
LanguageData.RoyalBed.label: royal bed
LanguageData.RoyalBed.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful, it is a work of art in itself. Fits two.
LanguageData.RoyalBed_Blueprint.label: royal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.RoyalBed_Blueprint_Install.label: royal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.RoyalBed_Frame.label: royal bed (building)
LanguageData.RoyalBed_Frame.description: A luxurious gold-inlaid bed fit for the highborn. Very comfy and beautiful, it is a work of art in itself. Fits two.
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: hospital bed
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: A bed specially designed for use in hospitals. Adjustable for a patient and festooned with built-in equipment, it improves medical outcomes over normal beds.
LanguageData.HospitalBed_Blueprint.label: hospital bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HospitalBed_Blueprint_Install.label: hospital bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HospitalBed_Frame.label: hospital bed (building)
LanguageData.HospitalBed_Frame.description: A bed specially designed for use in hospitals. Adjustable for a patient and festooned with built-in equipment, it improves medical outcomes over normal beds.
LanguageData.Bedroll.label: bedroll
LanguageData.Bedroll.description: A simple bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint.label: bedroll (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Blueprint_Install.label: bedroll (blueprint)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.label: bedroll (building)
LanguageData.Bedroll_Frame.description: A simple bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.label: double bedroll
LanguageData.BedrollDouble.description: A simple double-wide bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Blueprint.label: double bedroll (blueprint)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Blueprint_Install.label: double bedroll (blueprint)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Frame.label: double bedroll (building)
LanguageData.BedrollDouble_Frame.description: A simple double-wide bed that lays on the floor, usually made of cloth or leather, often lined with fur. It is lightweight and can be rolled up for easy transport, but it is not quite as comfortable as a typical bed. Caravans can use bedrolls while traveling for better sleep.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot.label: animal sleeping spot
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot_Blueprint.label: animal sleeping spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot_Frame.label: animal sleeping spot (building)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox.label: animal sleeping box
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox_Blueprint.label: animal sleeping box (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox_Frame.label: animal sleeping box (building)
LanguageData.AnimalSleepingBox_Frame.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.AnimalBed.label: animal bed
LanguageData.AnimalBed.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
LanguageData.AnimalBed_Blueprint.label: animal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalBed_Blueprint_Install.label: animal bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.AnimalBed_Frame.label: animal bed (building)
LanguageData.AnimalBed_Frame.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.
LanguageData.Stool.label: stool
LanguageData.Stool.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Stool_Blueprint.label: stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.Stool_Blueprint_Install.label: stool (blueprint)
LanguageData.Stool_Frame.label: stool (building)
LanguageData.Stool_Frame.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.DiningChair.label: dining chair
LanguageData.DiningChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.DiningChair_Blueprint.label: dining chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.DiningChair_Blueprint_Install.label: dining chair (blueprint)
LanguageData.DiningChair_Frame.label: dining chair (building)
LanguageData.DiningChair_Frame.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Armchair.label: armchair
LanguageData.Armchair.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.Armchair_Blueprint.label: armchair (blueprint)
LanguageData.Armchair_Blueprint_Install.label: armchair (blueprint)
LanguageData.Armchair_Frame.label: armchair (building)
LanguageData.Armchair_Frame.description: A large, soft, comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.EndTable.label: end table
LanguageData.EndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.EndTable_Blueprint.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTable_Blueprint_Install.label: end table (blueprint)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.label: end table (building)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Table1x2c.label: table (1x2)
LanguageData.Table1x2c.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.

LanguageData.PlantPot.label: plant pot
LanguageData.PlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.PlantPot_Blueprint.label: plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Blueprint_Install.label: plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Frame.label: plant pot (building)
LanguageData.PlantPot_Frame.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.TorchLamp.label: torch lamp
LanguageData.TorchLamp.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Blueprint.label: torch lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Frame.label: torch lamp (building)
LanguageData.TorchLamp_Frame.description: A wooden torch for lighting an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with wood. Produces a small amount of heat.
LanguageData.StandingLamp.label: standing lamp
LanguageData.StandingLamp.description: An electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blueprint.label: standing lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: standing lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Frame.label: standing lamp (building)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Frame.description: An electrical standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in red.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red_Blueprint_Install.label: standing lamp (red) (blueprint)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red_Frame.label: standing lamp (red) (building)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Red_Frame.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in red.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in green.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green_Frame.label: standing lamp (green) (building)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Green_Frame.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in green.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue.

LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue_Frame.label: standing lamp (blue) (building)
LanguageData.StandingLamp_Blue_Frame.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue.
LanguageData.SunLamp.label: sun lamp
LanguageData.SunLamp.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.SunLamp_Blueprint.label: sun lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: sun lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Frame.label: sun lamp (building)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Frame.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a huge amount of power. Automatically turns itself off at night.
LanguageData.Shelf.label: shelf
LanguageData.Shelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Shelf_Blueprint.label: shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shelf_Blueprint_Install.label: shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.Shelf_Frame.label: shelf (building)
LanguageData.Shelf_Frame.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.Dresser.label: dresser
LanguageData.Dresser.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.Dresser_Blueprint.label: dresser (blueprint)
LanguageData.Dresser_Blueprint_Install.label: dresser (blueprint)
LanguageData.Dresser_Frame.label: dresser (building)
LanguageData.Dresser_Frame.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
